title: Little Bea
description: Bzzzzzzzzzzzzz.Little Beais a busy, busy bee.When the sun wakes up,so does she. Friends! She needs to visit them. Treats! She needs to share them. Chores!She needs to do them. Games!She needs to play them. The whole wide world!She needs to explore itbefore the sun goes to sleep. Bzzzzzzzzzzzzz.Won't you come buzz along with Little Bea?
author: Daniel Roode
